episodes.title: Firstbourne
episodes.description: Emperor Garmadon has taken control of Ninjago City where Lloyd retreats to the shadows. Meanwhile, the other Ninja and Young Wu are shipwrecked in the Realm of Oni & Dragon and find they are not alone.

episodes.title: Iron and Stone
episodes.description: Cole and Young Wu attempt to free their friends, who have been taken captive by a tribe of Dragon Hunters. Meanwhile in Ninjago, Lloyd is reunited with some old friends who may prove valuable allies against Emperor Garmadon.

episodes.title: Radio Free Ninjago
episodes.description: Lloyd must find his voice as he leads a small resistance to capture the airwaves in Ninjago City. Meanwhile in the First Realm, Iron Baron takes the Ninja on a dragon hunt.

episodes.title: How to Build a Dragon
episodes.description: While Lloyd and the rebels celebrate their successful strike against Emperor Garmadon, in the Realm of Oni and Dragon, the Ninja dare an elaborate escape from the clutches of Iron Baron and his Dragon Hunters.

episodes.title: The Gilded Path
episodes.description: The headquarters to the resistance is breached and Lloyd scrambles to avoid capture. Meanwhile, the Ninja are caught by Heavy Metal, but find an unlikely ally.

episodes.title: Two Lies, One Truth
episodes.description: As Lloyd unmasks Mystake for who she truly is, Emperor Garmadon embraces Harumi as his daughter of darkness. Meanwhile, Wu holds onto faith as he leads his friends into dangerous Oni territory in the hope of finding Firstbourne’s nest.

episodes.title: The Weakest Link
episodes.description: Lloyd turns the tables on Harumi to take his father’s power away, and the Ninja learn what it takes to be a Dragon Hunter.

episodes.title: Saving Faith
episodes.description: Lloyd and his team plot to take control of the Oni Titan. Meanwhile in the First Realm, the Ninja fall into Iron Baron’s clutches and an old master returns.

episodes.title: Lessons for a Master
episodes.description: When Iron Baron forces Wu to retrieve the Dragon Armor, things don’t go as planned. In Ninjago, Lloyd can only endure so much as he holds onto hope for the Ninjas’ return.

episodes.title: Green Destiny
episodes.description: The Ninja finally return home and unite to stop Emperor Garmadon, forcing Lloyd to make a decision that will forever change Ninjago.
